text: 57|12|satyaviśvāsikaḷeyuṁ satyaviśvāsinikaḷeyuṁ, avaruṭe prakāśaṁ avaruṭe munbhāgaṅṅaḷilūṭeyuṁ valatubhāgaṅṅaḷilūṭeyuṁ sañcarikkunna nilayil nī kāṇunna divasaṁ! (annavarēāṭ paṟayappeṭuṁ:) innu niṅṅaḷkkuḷḷa santēāṣavārtta cila svargattēāppukaḷe paṟṟiyākunnu. avayuṭe tāḻbhāgattu kūṭi aruvikaḷ oḻukikeāṇṭirikkuṁ. niṅṅaḷ atil nityavāsikaḷāyirikkuṁ. at mahattāya bhāgyaṁ tanneyāṇ‌
